text:
Anyone care to read a ridiculously long blog post that hasn’t yet had a single round of editting?
I will probably be requesting more widely once it has been more editted.
<https://github.com/oxinabox/oxinabox.github.io/pull/16/files#diff-c0242c02109193c0b9fff0ce0f77f4aa7cf591a3df32713c0f461979c5d69b3c>

elements.text:
Anyone care to read a ridiculously long blog post that hasn’t yet had a single round of editting?
I will probably be requesting more widely once it has been more editted.

text: 2 paragraph impression: you use too many semicolons :sweat_smile:

It’s true. Any number of semicolons is too many.
I thought I had broken that habit.

elements.text:
It’s true. Any number of semicolons is too many.
I thought I had broken that habit.

text: Yeah pretty much all of them can be replaced with commas or periods (I do like using the occasional one myself though). I won't mention any more punctuation in my comments, you can deal with that yourself

Lol, you're going to have an awful time going through all of those comments. At least a lot of them are super trivial stuff that you can just apply without thinking. I also realized like halfway through that I was kinda imparting my own style on your writing, at least with sentence structure and commas and such. For that stuff I don't mind if you don't apply it.

Thanks a lot.
You left so many comments you broke github.
Legit i am very grateful, I just need to workout how I can review them…

text:
That was a interesting read! Thanks for putting that together.

I spotted some minor typos. I wasn't able to open the review page, e.g. `til` -> `till`.
